Package tetris.panels

Class TetrisPanel

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • tetris.panels.TetrisPanel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible
    public class TetrisPanel
extends javax.swing.JPanel
    The TetrisPanel facilitates the actual Tetris game TetrisPanel shows the blocks falling down and provides functionality for moving the blocks left to right TetrisPanel uses the Block class to show The Tetris blocks
    Author:
    Anup Bagali, Kevin Liu, Teja Kocherla, Amit Rajesh
    See Also:
    JPanel, Serialized Form
